医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员获得 500 万美元拨款，以扩大儿科长期 COVID-19 护理的覆盖范围肯尼迪克里格研究所的研究人员通过医疗保健研究和质量局 (AHRQ) 获得了美国卫生与公众服务部 (HHS) 的 500 万美元拨款，以扩大患有长期新冠肺炎的儿童和青少年获得全面护理的机会。 19，特别是在服务不足的人群中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Researchers-win-245-million-grant-to-expand-access-to-pediatric-long-COVID-19-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Researchers-win-245-million-grant-to-expand-access-to-pediatric-long-COVID-19-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5693e3dd-d835-489b-8603-09c2405b1bd5 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 15:37:30 -0400 Researchers win $5 million grant to expand access to pediatric long COVID-19 care
NIAID 拨款支持旨在改善曲霉菌感染患者预后的研究烟曲霉是存在于室内和室外的主要空气传播真菌，可引起各种疾病，其严重程度取决于个人的免疫状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/NIAID-grant-supports-research-aimed-at-improving-outcomes-for-病人-with-Aspergillus-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/NIAID-grant-supports-research-aimed-at-improving-outcomes-for-病人-with-Aspergillus-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad53ddf8-3932-47e2-9609-4156c3e9f095 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 15:31:53 -0400 NIAID grant supports research aimed at improving outcomes for patients with Aspergillus infections
德克萨斯农工大学的研究人员获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助，用于研究唐氏综合症患者的新陈代谢德克萨斯农工大学兽医与生物医学科学学院 (VMBS) 的一组研究人员获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的资助，用于研究唐氏综合症患者的新陈代谢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Texas-AM-researchers-win-NIH-grant-to-study-metabolism-in-people-with-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Texas-AM-researchers-win-NIH-grant-to-study-metabolism-in-people-with-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a1159c7-a0b7-4d80-b7e2-849d4b060d6e Tue, 17 Oct 2023 15:19:35 -0400 Texas A&M researchers win NIH grant to study metabolism in people with Down syndrome
研究发现有色人种大学生和第一代学生面临独特的心理健康挑战大学生的抑郁和焦虑是一个日益严重的公共卫生问题。佐治亚大学的新研究表明，对于与大多数同龄人不同种族的学生来说，这个问题可能更严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/College-students-of-color-and-first- Generation-students-face-unique-mental-health-challenges-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/College-students-of-color-and-first- Generation-students-face-unique-mental-health-challenges-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7723f226-e060-44b6-a175-f0965344c3c1 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 15:12:28 -0400 College students of color and first-generation students face unique mental health challenges, study finds
新的试验表明，月经杯是管理经期卫生的绝佳选择利物浦热带医学院领导的一项新试验显示，月经杯可能会减少感染并改善阴道健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Menstrual-cups-can-be-a-great-option-for-menstrual-hygiene-management-new-trial-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Menstrual-cups-can-be-a-great-option-for-menstrual-hygiene-management-new-trial-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b856129f-8fe7-40d3-bd0d-2f1304527d0e Tue, 17 Oct 2023 15:06:30 -0400 Menstrual cups can be a great option for menstrual hygiene management, new trial shows
“杯状细胞”在过敏性结膜炎的发生过程中发挥重要作用过敏性结膜炎发展的第一步是过敏原穿过上皮层。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/e2809cGoblet-cellse2809d-play-an-important-role-in-the-development-of-allergic-conjunctivitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/e2809cGoblet-cellse2809d-play-an-important-role-in-the-development-of-allergic-conjunctivitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b843a8-948f-4d4a-8e4a-7ce0605941d2 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 14:58:28 -0400 “Goblet cells” play an important role in the development of allergic conjunctivitis
人工智能驱动的软件可以通过 CT 扫描提供 MRI 质量的大脑图像在某些情况下，一种新方法可以从计算机断层扫描（CT）拍摄的大脑图像中提供与磁共振成像（MRI）拍摄的图像一样多的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/AI-powered-software-can-provide-MRI-quality-brain-images-from-CT-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/AI-powered-software-can-provide-MRI-quality-brain-images-from-CT-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=726ab60e-e9ff-4abc-9621-fbdbf575cd8c Tue, 17 Oct 2023 14:52:11 -0400 AI-powered software can provide MRI-quality brain images from CT scans
研究发现精神分裂症患者的大脑功能连接受到破坏精神分裂症是一种神经发育障碍，其症状包括精神病，被认为是由大脑连接和功能整合的紊乱引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Study-finds-disruptions-in-function-brain-connectivity-in-people-with-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Study-finds-disruptions-in-function-brain-connectivity-in-people-with-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9849fbdd-5551-488d-b447-cee7fd454e7f Tue, 17 Oct 2023 11:27:31 -0400 Study finds disruptions in functional brain connectivity in people with schizophrenia
女性性激素在阿尔茨海默病中发挥重要作用阿尔茨海默病对女性的影响尤为严重，女性约占被诊断患有该病晚发型的患者的三分之二。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Female-sex-hormones-play-significant-role-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Female-sex-hormones-play-significant-role-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8581ee9-f20c-491c-b0aa-23c98383ed44 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 11:23:12 -0400 Female sex hormones play significant role in Alzheimer's disease
新的通讯工具减少了患有医学上无法解释的身体症状的患者的病假时间医学上无法解释的身体症状 (MUPS) 的特点是持续的身体症状和功能障碍，缺乏已知医疗状况或病理学的解释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/New-communication-tool-reduces-sick-leave-in-病人-with-Mediically-Unexplained-Physical-Symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/New-communication-tool-reduces-sick-leave-in-病人-with-Mediically-Unexplained-Physical-Symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad9683eb-7625-417b-8374-33080138ffb0 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 10:26:44 -0400 New communication tool reduces sick leave in patients with Medically Unexplained Physical Symptoms
